translation.text: ME The Museum Campus east elevator is back in service.
The Museum Campus east elevator is back in service.
Train 22, scheduled to arrive Chicago at 7:32 a.m., is operating 20 to 25 minutes behind schedule due to freight train interference.
Train #1310, scheduled to arrive Chicago at 8:15 a.m., will be expressing after Naperville into Chicago.  Train #1236 & #1242 will accommodate passengers.
MED Van Buren Station Platform Elevator
The Van Buren Station Platform elevator is back in service.

BNSF  train #1306, scheduled to arrive Chicago Union Station at 7:41 AM, is stopped near Aurora due to mechanical problems. The duration of this delay is unknown. Metra will provide updates as information becomes available.
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 79th St., 87th St., and 103rd St. stations may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
Train 24, scheduled to arrive Chicago at 7:53 a.m., is operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to freight train interference.

Train #1228 and #1230 will be originating at Naperville today due to earlier mechanical problems on train #1306.  Train #1236 and #1242 will accommodate passengers. Visit Metratracker.com for the location of your train.
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.

Some UPNW trains may be operating up to 40 minutes behind schedule and operating out of sequence due to an earlier mechanical failure on train #612. For your safety, please stand behind the yellow line until your train comes to a complete stop.
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
Train #622, scheduled to depart Harvard at 6:00 a.m., is on the move delayed 28 to 33 minutes due to an earlier mechanical failure on train 612. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
UPNW - Train #612 Will Not Operate - Trains #614, #616, and #618 Accommodating (UPDATE)

Train #612, scheduled to depart Crystal Lake at 5:45 a.m., will not operate due to mechanical problems. Trains #614, #616, and #618 will accommodate passengers. Please visit metratracker.com for the location and delay times of your train. -Updated at 6:22a

BNSF  train #1228 scheduled to arrive Chicago Union Station at 7:59 AM, may be operating 15 to 25 minutes behind schedule, due to mechanical problems. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
RID #401 Scheduled to arrive in Joliet at 7:37 am is currently operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to earlier emergency track repair.
HC #914 Scheduled to arrive in Chicago at 6:52 am is currently operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to freight train interference
MED 51st Street East Elevator Out of Service
The 51st Street East elevator is out of service. Customers can use McCormick Place or 55th/56th/57th Street as alternate boarding stations.
